title: Apple and rhubarb crumble with oats
ingredients: ['4 to 5 large rhubarb sticks', '3 to 4 large cooking apples, peeled and cored', '8 to 10 tablespoons caster sugar', 'For the crumble', '110g butter', '110g dark soft brown sugar or Demerera sugar', '185g plain flour', '2 handfuls rolled oats']
